QuestData.Title: Trouble on the Western Front
QuestData.Description:
Alexandros and our Maldraxxi allies need reinforcement at the western gate on the Margrave's opposite flank. They are barely holding on!
Our forces will reinforce our position here and push forward towards Gharmal. We must make haste to Mograine--without both flanks we cannot hope to achieve victory.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly with Kynthia to report to Alexandros at the Stitchyard.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Mograine at the Stitchyard.
